  {
    "file_path": "h2q_project/tests/test_quaternion_ops.py",
    "content": "import unittest
import numpy as np
from h2q_project.quaternion_ops import quaternion_multiply, quaternion_conjugate, quaternion_inverse, quaternion_magnitude, quaternion_normalize, rotate_vector

class TestQuaternionOps(unittest.TestCase):

    def test_quaternion_multiply(self):
        q1 = [1, 0, 0, 0]
        q2 = [0, 1, 0, 0]
        expected = [0, 1, 0, 0]
        self.assertTrue(np.allclose(quaternion_multiply(q1, q2), expected))

        q1 = [0, 1, 0, 0]
        q2 = [0, 0, 1, 0]
        expected = [0, 0, 0, 1]
        self.assertTrue(np.allclose(quaternion_multiply(q1, q2), expected))

    def test_quaternion_conjugate(self):
        q = [1, 2, 3, 4]
        expected = [1, -2, -3, -4]
        self.assertTrue(np.allclose(quaternion_conjugate(q), expected))

    def test_quaternion_inverse(self):
        q = [0, 1, 0, 0]
        expected = [0, -1, 0, 0]
        self.assertTrue(np.allclose(quaternion_inverse(q), expected))

        q = [1, 2, 3, 4]
        magnitude = quaternion_magnitude(q)
        expected = [x / (magnitude**2) for x in [1, -2, -3, -4]]
        self.assertTrue(np.allclose(quaternion_inverse(q), expected))

    def test_quaternion_magnitude(self):
        q = [1, 2, 3, 4]
        expected = np.sqrt(1 + 4 + 9 + 16)
        self.assertAlmostEqual(quaternion_magnitude(q), expected)

    def test_quaternion_normalize(self):
        q = [1, 2, 3, 4]
        magnitude = quaternion_magnitude(q)
        expected = [x / magnitude for x in q]
        self.assertTrue(np.allclose(quaternion_normalize(q), expected))

        q = [0,0,0,0]
        expected = [0,0,0,0]
        self.assertTrue(np.allclose(quaternion_normalize(q), expected))

    def test_rotate_vector(self):
        vector = [1, 0, 0]
        axis = [0, 0, 1]
        angle = np.pi / 2  # 90 degrees
        expected = [0, 1, 0]
        rotated_vector = rotate_vector(vector, axis, angle)
        self.assertTrue(np.allclose(rotated_vector, expected))

        vector = [1, 0, 0]
        axis = [1, 0, 0]
        angle = np.pi / 2
        expected = [1, 0, 0]
        rotated_vector = rotate_vector(vector, axis, angle)
        self.assertTrue(np.allclose(rotated_vector, expected))


if __name__ == '__main__':
    unittest.main()"
  }
]
